item.description:
Donald Hall, Richard Wilbur, & Maxine Kumin will be reading from their work, followed by a discussion. This is litterally a once-in-a-lifetime event to see these poets together, and it should be a fantastic event.


The Abbey Room, Boston Public Library ? Copley
6:00 pm, FREE
Donald Hall, Richard Wilbur, & Maxine Kumin will be reading from their work, followed by a discussion. This is litterally a once-in-a-lifetime event to see these poets together, and it should be a fantastic event. It would be great to see some of you there.

Best,
item.name: Reading: Hall, Wilbur & Kumin at BPL
